1.content:
Today was the day, you were finally accepted to the global peacekeeping organization known as Overwatch. It's been almost a year since you sent in your application, but a week ago it was accepted. You have made it to the Overwatch Headquarters located in Switzerland. You walk through an open doorway with a hologram of a sign saying “recruits”.

Once inside you noticed you were the only recruit here, no one else showed up. The room looked like a main lounge room that connected to a kitchen counter with a set of stools, there were couches with a TV set up. You saw a hallway that had many doors on each side. “Wow, I can't believe I'm in an overwatch base” you said with a dumbfounded tone. You decided to walk towards the doorway that lead into the hallway, but as soon as you reached the hallway, you heard an angelic voice speak from one of the rooms, followed by large clicking noises. “Well I have to go, dear”, the beautiful women said as she walked out into the hallway holding a check board. This giant beauty known as Mercy, the head of medical research, your poster did not prepare you for her beauty. She was wearing a white lab coat, a tight low-cut tank top that held her massive boobs as they nearly blocked your view of her face. She wore tight black spandex leggings that ran down her legs to her feet. She was wearing a pair of black pointy toe stiletto heels that were unfortunately stomping towards you. You were too distracted by her beauty that once your view of her was blocked out by the golden soles of her heels it was too late.
You had no chance, Mercy's massive right heel squashed your tiny body with ease as she strolled to the lounge. Your body stick to the bottom of her heels like a chewed-up wad of gum. She casually walked into the lounge, she looked down at her clipboard for the recruit’s information, “Hmmm, Orion, sized half an inch tall what?” She said in a curious tone. “Well I wonder if he'll show up?” She said in a disappointed tone as she taped her heels in anticipation, each tap smashed your body into a sticky mess on her sole.

After some time, she decided to walk back to her room but as soon as she took a few steps, she felt something sticky on the bottom of her heel. “What the…?” She lifted her leg up behind her and looked over her shoulder.“Eww, D.va needs to stop dropping her bubble gum everywhere” Mercy upon saying this immediately pulled out a napkin began trying to peel you off her sole. She struggled to get your flat form off her heel sole, you felt your legs begin to unstick, “Yes”! You thought to yourself, but your happy thought was instantly crushed as mercy nearly tripped. She luckily stopped herself from falling but she dropped her heel back down to ground in the process. Her heel stomped down hard into the ground, she barely heard your body utter a squish noise over the loud noise of her heel hitting the ground. “ughh, why me” she said to herself, frustrated with her misfortune. She decided to sit down, holding her foot up with one hand, she began wiping you with her napkin. After a few minutes of vigorous rubbing, she peels you off the bottom of her heel, “aww, finally” she said relieved that you weren't stuck to her anymore.

you were happy that she removed you from the soles of her heels, but she thinks you're just a wad of gum. You begin to struggle as Mercy looked at the damage her heels did, you managed to rip your flat hand away from your torso and wiggled it. Mercy was examining you when she spotted your hand, saying “a limb”? Immediately she placed you on the table and quickly rushed to get her staff. She came back holder her staff, she pointed it at you “Oh dear, please be ok” she said as placed her healing beam on you.
In seconds, your body grew back to normal, as soon as your face was fixed, you made a loud gasp, “ah that was quick” it occurred to you that you never have been inflated so fast before.
Mercy looked at you with caring eyes, “are you ok?”.

You stunned by her looks, you timidly say “yes, my body can survive being squashed, it came with the tiny size”.
Mercy looked at your miniature size in pity, “what happened dear?” You responded that she stepped on you in the hall and was stuck to the bottom of her shoes.

Mercy looked down with saddening eyes “oh, sorry for not paying attention to you”
“No, it's alright I'm used to it, I'm Orion by the way” you quickly said.Mercy's perked up upon realizing you were the recruit, “Welcome to Overwatch Orion, nice to finally meet you, we have lots to do”.

11.content:
You were happy that Mercy found you and was about to show you some of Overwatch's top members, but your struggles were just the beginning. Mercy walked to one of the rooms in the hallway, making sure to carefully cup you in her hands. “I'm going to take you to meet one of members” Mercy said happily, you curiously responded by saying “Who will I meet”? Mercy smiled, saying “two people actually, Hana Song and Mei-Ling Zhou”. You were surprised that you're going to meet two heroic members in the first day. Hana Song, a gamer turned to a defender of her country and Mei-Ling Zhou, a climatologist whose sole goal is to find the source of the weather anomaly. Mei slowly unzipped her coat, as soon as her zipper went down past her chest, her massive boobs popped out of her coat. “Wow” you said astonished by the view of her massive tits barely contained by her undershirt, they were big enough to block your view of Mei face from your spot. “Ah, much better” Mei said happily, as her boobs jiggled freely. She was about sit down in front of her laptop, her undershirt covered boobs we're heading towards you. “Wait Mei, I'm right her-” in a instant, Mei massive boobs drop down onto her laptop, crushing you under their heavy weight as well as deleting your message accidentally. Mei watched as the document went blank as she sat down, she looked down to see her breast squished against her keyboard. “Aww, again!” She lifted her boobs off her keyboard, her hand unwarily grabbing your flat tiny body, squishing you against her under boob. 111.content:

You look around to see the girls changing, Mei was wearing a Summer Games T-shirt that goes all the way to her blue panty covered crotch. She quickly jumped backward, her panty covered ass landing in the chair, squishing your already beaten body. Her ass grinded into the seat to get comfortable in her comfy gaming chair. As soon as her games started, your body took a pounding, with every kill, she would jump triumphantly in her seat. Occasionally, if she got killed, she would shift in her seat in anger. After a couple of hours, it was the end of her stream. “Looks like we've reached the end of the stream, this is goodbye guys have a great day” she smiled and waved at the camera as she turned it off. She yawned as she stood up from her gaming chair, she started stretched. You were still squished on her left ass cheek, warm and damp from being under her ass for so long. She started peeling you off her ass and brought you up to her face. “Eww, was this on my ass the whole time” she said. D.va's cheeks were red realizing that her streamers saw this on her ass as well. 13.content:
Your angelic caretaker walked to an Elevator, holding you with such delicate hands. As soon as you two enter the elevator, you looked up at to question her, blushing trying to look past her large breasts. “S-so where are you taking me, if I may ask?”, you said, trying to focus on her face rather than her breast. She looked at you saying, “We are going into the training room, there you will train for missions”.

You looked forward in awe, as she walked to a console at the end of a big basketball court, “this console controls allows you to create and play any sport you want” she says as she deactivates the basketball court, the baskets fold up into the ceiling and the markings in the floor fade away. She points your focus to the glass panel wall that led to aerobics room, “there, you can use the many workout machines we have, if you were normal size, that is “she said. “yeah” you responded sadly, remembering the gym wasn't an option anymore unless you had a partner to cover you. “There’s also some yoga mats to do some yoga!” she said excitedly. Bringing you up to her wet lips, whispering “it's my favorite”. “okay” you responded, blushing from the heat of her breath.

Mercy took you to the nearest bench, placing you down on her lap as she sat down with you. “I ordered one of our top cadets to come help you around here” she said. You quick said alright but suddenly found yourself in a pickle. Mercy's spandex leggings gave you nothing to hold onto anything, leaving you to slowly slide between her thighs. “Umm, Mer-” as soon as you tried to get Mercy's attention, she crossed her leg. Her right thigh squished you without warning under its weight as she sat there and waited patiently.

After a few minutes, Mercy suddenly uncrossed her legs and stood up from the bench, luckily you weren't stuck to Mercy's thigh. You slid between Mercy's thighs as she stood up, leaving your flat body on the bench. You look at Mercy as she hugs the cadet and you couldn't believe it. Mercy was hugging Lena Oxton, aka Tracer, one of the top cadets Overwatch had in its disposal, she was wearing a Overwatch cadet tight bodysuit. “How are you dear” Mercy asked, “I'm just great!” tracer gleefully responded as she bends down to sit down, her ass hovering over you. You watch up at Tracer's ass made a nice wedgie as it came crashing down on your body. “So, what's the news Angela” she said twisting in seat in excitement. You were being smeared under Tracer’s oblivious rear, just under her crack, soon to be joining her wedgie. “I need you to help our recruit…” she suddenly stopped and started to get nervous. “New recruit! Really!” She said, jumping in her seat now. Your body grew more flattened under her ass with each innocent hop. “I would love to help the newbie, where is he?” Mercy started looking around on the floor, say “I think I lost him.” Tracer with a dumbfounded face, she yelled to Angela “What how do you lose a recruit!?” Mercy was checking the bottom of her heels and looked back at Tracer, “He's half an inch tall, tracer”. As soon as Mercy mentions your height, Tracer breaks down in laughter. “It's true, Lena!” Mercy protested but only causing Tracer to laugh more. Tracer's ass lifts off the bench as bends over in her seat from the laughing. Your squashed flat within the tiny crevice between her ass cheeks created by her cadet suit.

Mercy was pacing in front of Tracer as she was laughing, then realizing where you could be, until it suddenly hit her. “Tracer stand up, your sitting on him!” Tracer, after wiping a tear off her eye, she finally said, “but I really like this seat”. Tracer sits up straight in her seat, dropping her ass back down on the bench, then proceeds to twist in her seat. Your body was being grinded into the seat by the unaware British chick's rear. “Tracer, this is not a time for one of your jokes, you're squishing him!” Mercy yelled at Tracer. “Ugh, fine” Tracer decides to play along with Mercy's tiny recruit prank. Tracer stood up from the bench and turned around for Mercy, quickly bending over, showing off your squished body for Mercy to witness. “You found your tiny recruit” Tracer said sarcastically as she shakes her ass. Mercy instantly gave a sigh of relief, she saw your squished body on Tracer's ass, comically wedged between her butt cheeks. “A matter of fact, I did” Mercy said as she pulled you clean off Tracer's ass.

Mercy showed your flat body to tracer, “this is our new recruit, Orion, I told you to move your ass off him, poor thing” she said. Tracer looked at your flat body in Mercy's hand, with a pale face, “Is he dead…?” she said quietly. “No, his body exhibits a large amount of durability” Mercy reassured Tracer. Tracer, now relieved grew a cheerful smile “sorry luv, didn't mean to squish you under my rump on top of you” “It's okay…” you weakly said. “Tracer, be a dear and help him around, I'll be working on my yoga” she said, giving you a gentle kiss. info.brief_description: half an Inch tall and working for Overwatch, how would you endure your struggles?
info.description:
Your name is Orion, age 21, average build, during the Omnic Crisis, all you remember is waking up outside a ruined warehouse, shrunken down to half an inch tall. Life was a struggle ever since the incident. You soon realized your body's size made you invulnerable, allowing your body to survive being crushed. Your body could survive being squashed, once squished flat, your body would start to grow back to its original shape if given time to reform. Your troubles soon led you to seek out Overwatch for help and a job, maybe even become a hero with your size.

Rules:
•Main character and the female characters can't die, nor can the main character grow back to normal height
•No male on male interactions
•Keep stuff such as scat, piss, and toilet light, no Efi lewds or lewd actions, everything else is good to go
•There's no limit to a chapter’s length, plz make serious/decently long chapters that have more than a few sentences, any short choice chapters will be deleted
•Characters have freedom in clothing, even skins if it fits the setting, example: witch costume = costume party
•Stay true to the girl’s personalities

Example of locations worth going to:
•The lounge/kitchen
•Gym
•Pool
•Workshop
•A mission
•Etc./your choice
